mainBoard.name: Dungeon Geists
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
When Dungeon Geists enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Dungeon Geists.

rulings.text: The ability can target a tapped creature. If the targeted creature is already tapped when it resolves, that creature just remains tapped and doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.

Dungeon Geists’s triggered ability can target a tapped creature. If the targeted creature is already tapped when it resolves, that creature just remains tapped and won’t untap during its controller’s untap step.
If Dungeon Geists leaves the battlefield before its triggered ability has resolved, the target creature will be tapped, but it will be able to untap as normal.
If another player gains control of Dungeon Geists, its effect expires. It won’t keep the creature from untapping anymore, even if you later regain control of Dungeon Geists.

Духовная связь (Вы можете образовать пару между этим существом и другим существом без пары, когда одно из них выходит на поле битвы. Они остаются в паре, пока оба находятся под вашим контролем.)
Пока Всевидящий Кормчий находится в паре с другим существом, каждое из тех существ имеет способность «{1}{U}: изгоните это существо, затем верните его на поле битвы под вашим контролем».

foreignData.name: 神准导灵
foreignData.text:
魂系 （你可以将此生物与另一未搭档生物在它们任一进战场时组搭档。 只要你操控它们，此两者便持续搭档。）
只要神准导灵与另一生物搭档，它们便各具有「{1}{U}：放逐此生物，然后将它在你的操控下移回战场。」

foreignData.name: 神準導靈
foreignData.text:
魂繫 （你可以將此生物與另一未搭檔生物在它們任一進戰場時組搭檔。 只要你操控它們，此兩者便持續搭檔。）
只要神準導靈與另一生物搭檔，它們便各具有「{1}{U}：放逐此生物，然後將它在你的操控下移回戰場。」

mainBoard.name: Deadeye Navigator
mainBoard.originalText:
Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)
As long as Deadeye Navigator is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "{1}{U}: Exile this creature, then return it to the battlefield under your control."

rulings.text: If you activate the ability granted by Deadeye Navigator, the creature will be exiled, the pair will immediately be broken, and then the card will be returned to the battlefield. Deadeye Navigator’s soulbond ability triggers when that card enters the battlefield and the pair can then be reunited.

Once Deadeye Navigator or the creature it’s paired with is exiled, the other creature will no longer have the activated ability. However, you can activate the ability of one creature in response to activating the ability of the other creature.

mainBoard.text:
Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)
As long as Deadeye Navigator is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "{1}{U}: Exile this creature, then return it to the battlefield under your control."

foreignData.name: Sphinx von Uthuun
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Wenn die Sphinx von Uthuun ins Spiel kommt, decke die obersten fünf Karten deiner Bibliothek auf. Ein Gegner teilt diese Karten auf zwei Haufen auf. Nimm die Karten des einen Haufens auf deine Hand und lege die anderen auf deinen Friedhof.

foreignData.name: Esfinge de Uthuun
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Cuando la Esfinge de Uthuun entre al campo de batalla, muestra las primeras cinco cartas de tu biblioteca. Un oponente separa esas cartas en dos montones. Pon un montón en tu mano y el otro en tu cementerio.

foreignData.name: Sphinx d'Uthuün
foreignData.text:
Vol
Quand le Sphinx d'Uthuün arrive sur le champ de bataille, révélez les cinq cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Un adversaire sépare ces cartes en deux tas. Mettez un tas dans votre main et l'autre dans votre cimetière.

foreignData.name: Sfinge di Uthuun
foreignData.text:
Volare
Quando la Sfinge di Uthuun entra nel campo di battaglia, rivela le prime cinque carte del tuo grimorio. Un avversario separa quelle carte in due pile. Aggiungi alla tua mano una pila e metti l'altra nel tuo cimitero.

foreignData.name: ウスーンのスフィンクス
foreignData.text:
飛行
ウスーンのスフィンクスが戦場に出たとき、あなたのライブラリーの一番上から５枚のカードを公開する。いずれかの対戦相手は、それらのカードを２つの束に分ける。一方の束をあなたの手札に加え、もう一方をあなたの墓地に置く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — スフィンクス

foreignData.name: 우쑨의 스핑크스
foreignData.text:
비행
우쑨의 스핑크스가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 다섯 장을 공개한다. 한 상대가 이렇게 공개된 카드를 두 더미로 나눈다. 그 중 한 더미를 당신의 손으로 가져가고 다른 더미는 당신의 무덤에 넣는다.

foreignData.name: Esfinge de Uthuun
foreignData.text:
Voar
Quando Esfinge de Uthuun entrar no campo de batalha, revele os cinco cards do topo de seu grimório. Um oponente separa aqueles cards em dois montes. Coloque um monte na sua mão e o outro em seu cemitério.

foreignData.name: Сфинкс Утуна
foreignData.text:
Полет
Когда Сфинкс Утуна выходит на поле битвы, покажите пять верхних карт вашей библиотеки. Оппонент делит те карты на две стопки. Положите одну стопку в вашу руку, а другую — на ваше кладбище.

foreignData.name: 乌屯史芬斯
foreignData.text:
飞行
当乌屯史芬斯进战场时，展示你牌库顶的五张牌。由任一对手将它们分成两堆。将其中一堆置于你手上，另一堆置于你的坟墓场。

foreignData.name: 烏屯史芬斯
foreignData.text:
飛行
當烏屯史芬斯進戰場時，展示你牌庫頂的五張牌。由任一對手將它們分成兩堆。將其中一堆置於你手上，另一堆置於你的墳墓場。

mainBoard.name: Sphinx of Uthuun
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
When Sphinx of Uthuun enters the battlefield, reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

rulings.text: A pile can have no cards in it. In this case, you'll choose whether to put all the revealed cards into your hand or into your graveyard.

In multiplayer games, you choose an opponent to separate the cards when the ability resolves. This doesn't target that opponent. Because the cards are revealed, all players may see the cards and offer opinions.
You (not your opponent) choose which pile to put into your hand and which to put into your graveyard.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
When Sphinx of Uthuun enters, reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"If the other guilds want a war, they should know we've been ready the whole time."
—Ruric Thar, Ghor-Clan chieftain

foreignData.flavorText: „Wenn die anderen Gilden Krieg wollen, sollten sie wissen, dass wir schon die ganze Zeit darauf vorbereit waren." —Ruric Thar, Häuptling des Ghor-Clans
foreignData.name: Gruul-Zornbestie
foreignData.text: Immer wenn die Gruul-Zornbestie oder eine andere Kreatur unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, kämpft diese Kreatur gegen eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert.

foreignData.text: Siempre que la Bestia iracunda gruul u otra criatura entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, esa criatura lucha contra la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente.

foreignData.text: À chaque fois que la Ragebête de Gruul ou qu'une autre créature arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, cette créature se bat contre une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle.

foreignData.flavorText: 「他のギルドは戦争したがってるらしいけどよ、俺達がいつでも準備万端だってことは分かってるんだろうな。」――ゴーア族の酋長、ルーリク・サー

foreignData.flavorText: "다른 길드들이 전쟁을 원한다면 우리는 언제든지 준비되 있다는걸 보여주지." —고르 부족장 루릭 타르

foreignData.flavorText: «Если другие гильдии хотят войны, пусть знают, что мы к ней всегда готовы». — Рурик Тар, вождь клана Гхор

foreignData.flavorText: 「若其他公會希望開戰，他們應該知道我們早備戰已久。」 ～高爾族酋長魯瑞雜爾
foreignData.name: 古魯怒獸
foreignData.text: 每當古魯怒獸或另一個生物在你的操控下進戰場時，該生物與目標由對手操控的生物互鬥。

mainBoard.name: Gruul Ragebeast
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever Gruul Ragebeast or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature fights target creature an opponent controls.

rulings.text: Gruul Ragebeast's triggered ability isn't optional. However, if no opponent controls a creature when a creature enters under your control, the ability will be removed from the stack.
If one or both of the creatures that are supposed to fight are no longer on the battlefield when the ability resolves, the fight won't happen. Neither creature will deal or be dealt damage.
If the target creature is an illegal target when the ability tries to resolve, it won't resolve and none of its effects will happen. Neither creature will deal or be dealt damage.

mainBoard.text: Whenever Gruul Ragebeast or another creature you control enters, that creature fights target creature an opponent controls.

mainBoard.flavorText: "How truly vast this city must be, that I have traveled so far and seen so much, yet never once found the place where the buildings fail."

foreignData.flavorText: „Diese Stadt muss wirklich riesig sein, denn ich bin weit gereist und habe doch noch keinen Ort gefunden, wo die Gebäude aufhören."
foreignData.name: Fernsuche
foreignData.text: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Ebene, einer Insel, einem Sumpf oder einem Gebirge und bringe diese Karte getappt ins Spiel. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.

foreignData.flavorText: "Es realmente tan vasta esta ciudad, que con todo lo que he viajado y visto, todavía no he encontrado un lugar donde no haya edificios."
foreignData.name: Visión lejana
foreignData.text: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de llanura, isla, pantano o montaña y ponla en el campo de batalla girada. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.

foreignData.flavorText: « Que cette cité est vaste... J'ai tant voyagé, j'ai vu tant de choses, et pourtant, jamais je n'ai trouvé un lieu où les constructions s'arrêtent. »
foreignData.name: Cherchauloin
foreignData.text: Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de plaine, d'île, de marais ou de montagne et mettez-la sur le champ de bataille engagée. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.

foreignData.flavorText: "Deve essere davvero vasta questa città, dato che l'ho attraversata in lungo e in largo e non ho mai visto un punto in cui non ci fossero edifici."
foreignData.name: Lungosguardo
foreignData.text: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta Pianura, Isola, Palude o Montagna e mettila sul campo di battaglia TAPpata. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.

foreignData.flavorText: この都市は本当になんて巨大なんだろう。あちこちを旅して様々な物を見てきたけれど、建物が崩れている場所は見たことがないよ。
foreignData.name: 遥か見
foreignData.text: あなたのライブラリーから、平地カード１枚か島カード１枚か沼カード１枚か山カード１枚を探し、それをタップ状態で戦場に出す。その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。

foreignData.flavorText: "이 도시를 오랫동안 돌아다녔음에도 불구하고 건물이 끝나는 곳을 본 적이 없음을 생각하면, 이 도시의 규모가 얼마나 큰지 짐작도 되지 않는다."
foreignData.name: 원거리 탐사
foreignData.text: 당신의 서고에서 들, 섬, 늪 또는 산 카드 한 장을 찾아 탭된 채로 전장에 놓는다. 그러고 나서 당신의 서고를 섞는다.

foreignData.flavorText: "O quão vasta pode realmente ser esta cidade? Eu já viajei para tão longe e vi tantas coisas e nunca cheguei ao lugar onde os prédios acabam."
foreignData.name: Busca Longínqua
foreignData.text: Procure um card de Planície, Ilha, Pântano ou Montanha no seu grimório e coloque-o no campo de batalha virado. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.

foreignData.flavorText: «Этот город должен быть воистину велик. Я много странствовал и видел немало, но ни разу еще я не встречал места в нем, где бы не было зданий».
foreignData.name: Дальнее Странствие
foreignData.text: Найдите в вашей библиотеке карту Равнины, Острова, Болота или Горы и положите ее на поле битвы повернутой. Затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.

foreignData.flavorText: 「这城市究竟广大到什么地步呢？我已旅行了那么远，看了那么多，却还没找到毫无建物的地方。」
foreignData.name: 远眺
foreignData.text: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张平原、海岛、沼泽、或山脉牌并将它横置进战场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 「這城市究竟廣大到什麼地步呢？我已旅行了那麼遠，看了那麼多，卻還沒找到毫無建物的地方。」
foreignData.name: 遠眺
foreignData.text: 從你的牌庫中搜尋一張平原、海島、沼澤、或山脈牌並將它橫置進戰場。然後將你的牌庫洗牌。

mainBoard.name: Farseek
mainBoard.originalText: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: Farseek can find any land with any of the listed land types, including nonbasic ones, even if that land is a Forest in addition to one or more of those types.

mainBoard.text: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

mainBoard.name: Urban Evolution
mainBoard.originalText: Draw three cards. You may play an additional land this turn.

rulings.text: If you somehow manage to cast Urban Evolution when it's not your turn, you'll draw three cards when it resolves, but you won't be able to play a land that turn.
The effects of multiple Urban Evolutions in the same turn are cumulative. They're also cumulative with other effects that let you play additional lands, such as the one from Explore.

Urban Evolution's effect allows you to play an additional land during your main phase. Doing so follows the normal timing rules for playing lands. In particular, you don't get to play a land as Urban Evolution resolves; Urban Evolution fully resolves first and you draw three cards, perhaps including a land you'll play later.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Meister des Arkanen wissen eine besondere Ironie zu würdigen. Ihre tiefen und komplexen Studien des Arkanen laufen auf ein einfaches Ergebnis hinaus: auf die Fähigkeit, einfach nur Ja oder Nein zu sagen.
foreignData.name: Negieren
foreignData.text: Neutralisiere einen Nicht-Kreaturen-Zauberspruch deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText: Los maestros de lo arcano saborean una deliciosa ironía. Su estudio de las complejidades arcanas más profundas tiene un fin extremadamente sencillo: la mera habilidad de decir sí o no.
foreignData.name: Negar
foreignData.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo que no sea de criatura.

foreignData.flavorText: Les maîtres sorciers savourent une ironie délicieuse. Leur étude approfondie et complexe des arcanes n'a qu'un seul objectif : leur donner la capacité de dire simplement oui ou non.
foreignData.name: Négation
foreignData.text: Contrecarrez le sort non-créature ciblé.

foreignData.flavorText: I signori dell'arcanismo assaporano una deliziosa ironia. I loro studi arcani più profondi e complicati li portano a una conclusione semplicissima: la capacità di dichiarare esclusivamente sì o no.
foreignData.name: Negare
foreignData.text: Neutralizza una magia non creatura bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 秘儀の習得とは皮肉めいた面白さを堪能することだ。深く難解な秘儀の研究の果てに至るのは単純な結論、単に是か非かを決定する能力なのだから。
foreignData.name: 否認
foreignData.text: クリーチャーでない呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。

foreignData.flavorText: 비술의 대가들은 절묘한 모순을 즐긴다. 그들이 복잡한 비술 연구 끝에 얻는 능력은 단지 예 또는 아니오라고 말할 수 있는 지극히 단순한 능력뿐이라는 것이다.
foreignData.name: 부인
foreignData.text: 생물 주문이 아닌 주문 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Os mestres do arcano apreciam uma deliciosa ironia. Seus estudos dos profundos e complexos ensinamentos arcanos levam a um simplicíssimo final: a capacidade de dizer meramente sim ou não.
foreignData.name: Negar
foreignData.text: Anule a mágica alvo que não seja de criatura.

foreignData.flavorText: Могучие волшебники ценят тонкую иронию. Изучение самых глубоких и сложных загадок магии ведет к такой простой цели: сказать всего лишь «да» или «нет».
foreignData.name: Отвергнуть
foreignData.text: Отмените целевое заклинание, не являющееся существом.

foreignData.flavorText: 秘术大师很欣赏此等绝妙吊诡：他们深沉又复杂的秘法会导出简单至极的结果～只需说出是或否两字的能力。
foreignData.name: 失效
foreignData.text: 反击目标非生物咒语。

foreignData.flavorText: 祕術大師很欣賞祕術大師很欣賞此等絕妙弔詭：他們深沉又複雜的祕法會導出簡單至極的結果～只需說出是或否兩字的能力。
foreignData.name: 失效
foreignData.text: 反擊目標非生物咒語。

sideBoard.name: Negate

rulings.text: A “creature spell” is any spell with the type creature, even if it has other types such as artifact or enchantment. Older cards of type summon are also creature spells.

sideBoard.flavorText:
"You're in luck. I brought enough to share."
—Chandra Nalaar

foreignData.flavorText: „Du hast Glück. Ich kann ein paar abgeben." —Chandra Nalaar
foreignData.name: Flammen des Hitzkopfs
foreignData.text: Flammen des Hitzkopfs fügt 3 Schadenspunkte zu, deren Aufteilung auf ein, zwei oder drei Ziele deiner Wahl, die Kreaturen und/oder Spieler sein können, du bestimmst.

foreignData.flavorText: "Tienes suerte. Traigo suficiente como para compartir." —Chandra Nalaar
foreignData.name: Llamas de la instigadora
foreignData.text: Las Llamas de la instigadora hacen 3 puntos de daño divididos como elijas entre una, dos o tres criaturas y/o jugadores objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: « Vous avez de la chance. Je suis partageuse. » —Chandra Nalaàr
foreignData.name: Flammes du brandon
foreignData.text: Les Flammes du brandon infligent 3 blessures réparties de la manière que vous choisissez entre une, deux ou trois cibles, créatures et/ou joueurs.

foreignData.flavorText: "Sei fortunato. Ne ho portato abbastanza da condividere." —Chandra Nalaar
foreignData.name: Fiamme del Tizzone Ardente
foreignData.text: Le Fiamme del Tizzone Ardente infliggono 3 danni suddivisi a tua scelta tra una, due o tre creature e/o giocatori bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 「あんたは幸せよ。私のものを分けてあげる。」 ――チャンドラ・ナラー
foreignData.name: 炬火の炎
foreignData.text: クリーチャーやプレイヤーを、望む組み合わせで1つまたは望む組み合わせでつか3つ対象とする。炬火の炎はそれらに、３点のダメージを好きなように分割して与える。

foreignData.flavorText: "운수도 좋군. 부족하지 않을 정도로 가져왔지." —찬드라 날라르
foreignData.name: 선동가의 불길
foreignData.text: 생물 및 플레이어를 대상으로 최대 세 개까지의 목표를 정한다. 선동가의 불길은 그 목표들에게 피해 3점을 당신이 나눈 대로 입힌다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Você está com sorte. Eu trouxe o suficiente para compartilhar." — Chandra Nalaar
foreignData.name: Chamas da Instigadora
foreignData.text: Chamas da Instigadora causa 3 pontos de dano distribuídos à sua escolha entre uma, duas ou três criaturas e/ou jogadores alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: «Тебе повезло — могу поделиться». — Чандра Налаар
foreignData.name: Пламя Разжигательницы
foreignData.text: Пламя Разжигательницы наносит 3 повреждения, разделенные по вашему выбору между одним, двумя или тремя целевыми существами и (или) игроками.

foreignData.flavorText: 「你走好运啦。我带来的够大家享用。」～茜卓纳拉
foreignData.name: 惹事人烈焰
foreignData.text: 惹事人烈焰对一个，两个，或三个目标生物和／或牌手造成共3点伤害，你可以任意分配。

foreignData.flavorText: 「你走好運啦。我帶來的夠大家享用。」 ～茜卓納拉
foreignData.name: 惹事人烈焰
foreignData.text: 惹事人烈焰對一個，兩個，或三個目標生物和／或玩家造成共3點傷害，你可以任意分配。

sideBoard.name: Flames of the Firebrand
sideBoard.originalText: Flames of the Firebrand deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.

rulings.text: You divide the damage as you cast Flames of the Firebrand, not as it resolves. Each target must be assigned at least 1 damage. (In other words, as you put the spell on the stack, you choose whether to have it deal 3 damage to a single target, 2 damage to one target and 1 damage to another target, or 1 damage to each of three targets.)

sideBoard.text: Flames of the Firebrand deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

foreignData.flavorText: „Diese Scheußlichkeit gehörte nie in unsere Welt. Ich lasse sie nur frei." —Dierk, Geistermagier
foreignData.name: Auflösung
foreignData.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl. Wird der Zauberspruch auf diese Weise neutralisiert, schicke ihn ins Exil, anstatt ihn auf den Friedhof seines Besitzers zu legen.

foreignData.flavorText: "Esta abominación nunca perteneció a nuestro mundo. Simplemente estoy liberándola." —Dierk, mago de geists
foreignData.name: Disipar
foreignData.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo. Si ese hechizo se contrarresta de esta manera, exílialo en vez de ponerlo en el cementerio de su propietario.

foreignData.flavorText: « Cette abomination n'a jamais eu sa place sur notre monde. Je ne fais que la libérer. » —Dierk, geistmage
foreignData.name: Dissipation
foreignData.text: Contrecarrez le sort ciblé. Si ce sort est contrecarré de cette manière, exilez-le à la place de le mettre dans le cimetière de son propriétaire.

foreignData.flavorText: "Questo abominio non è mai stato del nostro mondo. Lo sto semplicemente liberando." —Dierk, mago dei geist
foreignData.name: Dissipare
foreignData.text: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio. Se quella magia è neutralizzata in questo modo, esiliala invece di metterla nel cimitero del suo proprietario.

foreignData.flavorText: 「この忌まわしきものは我々の世界のものではない。 単に自由の身にしてやっただけだ。」 ――霊魔道士、ディールク
foreignData.name: 雲散霧消
foreignData.text: 呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。 その呪文がこれにより打ち消された場合、それをオーナーの墓地に置く代わりに追放する。

foreignData.flavorText: "이 흉물은 우리 세상의 것이 아니야. 즉, 난 이것을 해방시키고 있는 셈이지."—심령술사 디어크
foreignData.name: 일소

foreignData.flavorText: "Esta abominação não pertence ao nosso mundo. Eu estou apenas liberando-a." — Dierk, geisteomago

foreignData.text: Anule a mágica alvo. Se aquela mágica for anulada dessa maneira, em vez de colocá-la no cemitério de seu dono, exile-a.

foreignData.name: Развеивание

foreignData.flavorText: 「這憎恨獸從不屬於我們的世界。 我只是讓它自由。」 ～遊魂法師第爾克

sideBoard.name: Dissipate
sideBoard.originalText: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

rulings.text: If the spell is not countered (because the spell it targets can't be countered), then it does not get exiled.
The card does not go to the graveyard before being exiled.
